===Etymology===
Similar syllables pronounced with the first tone to the eighth tone respectively in Min Nan.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|mn=kun kún kùn kut kûn kún kūn ku̍t
|cat=ph
}}

===Phrase===
{{zh-phrase}}

# {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} {{non-gloss definition|A meaningless phrase used to memorise the eight tones in Min Nan.}}

====Usage notes====
In many dialects of Min Nan, the second tone and the sixth tone have merged.
